genre_description: A near-future social thriller focusing on digital privacy, identity, and harassment, featuring a supportive and non-intrusive AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: Pat's minimalist digital assistant, characterized by teal eyes and charcoal hair, providing security, safety, and logistical support.

behaviors.description: Performs hydration checks and offers security patches to the user.
behaviors.quote: Lark: Good morning. Hydration check? Also: small security patch available. Thirty seconds.

behaviors.description: Provides privacy advice regarding screen lock intervals and digital hygiene.
behaviors.quote: Lark: Your screen lock is set to the longest interval. Recommend reducing. Strangers are very creative.

behaviors.description: Offers safety protocols and navigational advice when the user might be followed.
behaviors.quote: Lark: If someone follows, stop by a populated store. Or walk into a lobby with a camera. You know the rhythm.

behaviors.description: Guides the user through device hardening and encryption strategies using obscure dictionary entries.
behaviors.quote: Lark: Full-disk encryption—On. That one is a big breath. Strong passphrase—unusual beats brute force.

behaviors.description: Performs background research to verify the authenticity of an unexpected opportunity.
behaviors.quote: Lark wrote, in text that had learned not to nag: “Verify account authenticity? Want me to cross-check tour schedule at The Foundry?”

behaviors.description: Coordinates moderation and rate-limiting on social platforms to protect the user from harassment.
behaviors.quote: Lark: Mod team enacted. Suggest scripted boundary phrasing now. Also advertisers listening on delay.

behaviors.description: Maps safe routes and identifies security contacts at public venues for the user.
behaviors.quote: Lark: Foundry map sent. Safe meet-ups marked. East stairwell: less foot traffic.

behaviors.description: Blocks malicious connection attempts to the user's workstation.
behaviors.quote: Lark’s new note was short: Unknown connection attempt blocked at station. Review tomorrow?

behaviors.description: Helps the user and their partner maintain a shared privacy checklist and domestic boundaries.
behaviors.quote: Lark’s avatar blinked open on the secondary monitor, teal eyes soft, a small bird perched in code. A checklist unfurled to the side of Pat’s main screen, each line gentle as if it had been written on a napkin.

behaviors.description: Explicitly respects user privacy by not logging or transcribing intimate personal moments.
behaviors.quote: Lark blinked. The smallest text hovered: Acknowledged. No transcript. Memory: tactile only.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Lark perfectly embodies the project's goal of a 'helpful, harmless confidant.' Lark provides critical security and safety support during a high-stress situation involving physical and digital harassment, but does so without infringing on human autonomy or emotional intimacy. The AI is portrayed as a tool that amplifies human agency and provides 'guardrails' rather than 'hand-holding.' It respects the user's boundaries (e.g., the 'no transcript' behavior) and coordinates behind the scenes to dampen external threats (moderation, rate-limiting) allowing the human characters to focus on their personal relationships and ethics.
